attributes.action: Step in and stop Nestle discontinuing the production of Lion Bars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a big fan of the crunchy chewy delight that is the lion bar. Discontinuing it is wrong and we must act now as a nation to prevent this heinous crime from being committed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
